episodes.title: WAR Against Scientology on Hollywood Blvd (w/@Scientology_Audit )
episodes.description:
Inside the grassroots protest to cancel Scientology, the alien cult created by science fiction writer L. Ron Hubbard that enslaves people for a billion years.

This week on 51/49, James interviews William Gude aka StreetsLA, and joins a group of Scientology protesters on Hollywood Blvd to investigate the inner workings of an institution that has long been shrouded in mystery and controversy, exposing the Church of Scientology's recruitment tactics, alleged psychological abuse of members, claims of human trafficking and forced labor, and Scientology's seemingly close ties with law enforcement, celebrities, the media, and the government.

For daily livestreams, follow:
@Scientology_Audit 
@jesspalmadessa 
@Chriswithoutahellcat 

0:00 Is Scientology a Cult?
3:29 Scientology Accused of Human Trafficking
6:29 TikTokers' Effort to End Scientology
8:01 Police/Media/Gov't in Cohoots with Scientology?
12:03 The Future of Anti-Scientology Protest Movement
 
51/49 with James Li - Commentary on business, politics, and the other things (from an independent perspective)

Follow James on TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@5149jamesli
Follow James on X (formerly Twitter): https://twitter.com/5149jamesli
